inference.pp_cluster

Submodules

inference.pp_cluster.infer

segmenter_backend.inference.pp_cluster.infer.get_cluster(radiomics_df: DataFrame, cluster_artifacts: Dict[str, Any]) → List[int][source]

Assigns clusters to each case based on radiomics features.

Parameters:

  • radiomics_df (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing radiomics features.

  • cluster_artifacts (Dict[str, Any]) – Dictionary containing cluster artifacts including normalizer, PCA, and KMeans models.

Returns:

List of cluster assignments for each case.

Return type:

List[int]

segmenter_backend.inference.pp_cluster.infer.get_cluster_artifacts(task: str) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Retrieves cluster artifacts based on the specified task.

Parameters:

task (str) – The task identifier (e.g., ‘BraTS-SSA’, ‘BraTS-PED’).

Returns:

Dictionary containing cluster artifacts.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

segmenter_backend.inference.pp_cluster.infer.load_json(path: Path) → Any[source]

Loads a JSON file from the specified path.

Parameters:

path (Path) – A Path representing the file path.

Returns:

The data loaded from the JSON file.

Return type:

Any

segmenter_backend.inference.pp_cluster.infer.main() → None[source]

Main function to assign clusters to cases based on radiomics features.

Parses command-line arguments, loads radiomics data and cluster artifacts, assigns clusters, and saves the updated data to a JSON file.

segmenter_backend.inference.pp_cluster.infer.save_json(path: Path, data: Any) → None[source]

Saves data to a JSON file at the specified path.

Parameters:

  • path (Path) – A Path representing the file path.

  • data (Any) – The data to be serialized and saved.
